user_query: I am planning a trip to New York City next month. Can you provide me with the 16-day forecast for the city? Also, I would like to know the current weather data for New York City. Additionally, can you suggest some upcoming events in the city?

TaskList.description: Fetch the current weather data for New York City.
Retrieve the 16-day weather forecast for New York City.
Look up upcoming events happening in New York City.
